summary.value: It looms invisibly over Epiala and warps the hearts of its people.

data.haunt:
If you donâ€™t have a Bond of mistrust with the Hauntee, on each of their turns, they may ask a question about a creature they can see about what that creature fears or who they plan to hurt. The GM answers truthfully.

If you have a Bond of mistrust with the Hauntee, they are @EFFECT[shaken], and cannot recover until the Haunt is banished or they leave the scene.
data.ritual: Bring a person or object into conformity with their surroundings.
